title: [Self-Directed] Problem-Based Learning Design Using Virtual Chemistry Laboratory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry concepts and ICT (Information and Communication Technology) application skills

learning_goals: They can design a project to solve chemistry lab problems based on the 5I Framework (Innovation, Interactivity, Engagement, Informativeness, Impact).
